aboutData.title: Hi! I'm Deepak Vishwakarma
aboutData.subtitle: Full Stack Developer
aboutData.text: I am Deepak Vishwakarma, a Full Stack Developer with expertise in building scalable and efficient web applications.

services.title: Web Development
services.text: I build high performance, scalable web applications tailored to your needs, ensuring seamless user experiences.

services.title: Frontend & UI Development
services.text: I craft intuitive and interactive user interfaces using React.js and modern frontend technologies.

services.title: Responsive Web Design
services.text: I create visually stunning, mobile-friendly websites that adapt flawlessly across all screen sizes and devices.

services.title: API Development & Integration
services.text: I develop secure and efficient RESTful & GraphQL APIs, integrating third-party services for enhanced functionality.

services.title: Database Design & Management
services.text: MySQL to MongoDB, I design and manage databases that optimize data flow and application performance.

services.title: Backend Development & Server Management
services.text: I develop strong backend systems with Node.js, making sure they're secure, fast, and run smoothly.

skillData.title: Skills & Expertise
skillData.text: I have a strong foundation in computer engineering and a passion for building seamless digital experiences. I specialize in crafting dynamic web applications and scalable solutions, with expertise in both frontend and backend development. Whether designing intuitive user interfaces, developing secure APIs, or managing databases efficiently, I bring innovation and precision to every project. My journey has been shaped by real world experience, from building business websites to participating in hackathons and IoT projects.

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer Freelance
experience.subTitle: Project Based
experience.text: I create custom, High Performance websites and applications that exceed client expectations. By leveraging technologies like React, Node.js, and MySQL, I deliver seamless, user friendly solutions tailored to business needs.

experience.title: Web Developer
experience.subTitle: Build My Website
experience.text: Developed and launched multiple websites using WordPress, including E-Commerce and facility management sites. Optimized performance, ensured responsive design, and conducted rigorous testing for a seamless user experience.

experience.title: IT Hardware and Network Engineer
experience.subTitle: Shanbhag Computers
experience.text: Diagnosed and resolved IT hardware and network issues, ensuring seamless operations. Provided timely technical support to minimize downtime and improve system efficiency.

education.title: Bachelor in Computer Engineering
education.subTitle: Mumbai University
education.text: Gaining in depth knowledge of Software Development, Databases, System Architecture, Cloud Computing, AI technologies, and Machine Learning while working on real world projects and innovative solutions.

education.title: Diploma in Computer Engineering
education.subTitle: Maharashtra State Board of Technical Education
education.text: Built a strong foundation in Programming, Networking, Hardware, and System Design, with hands on experience in developing Web, IoT based, and Mobile Applications, while enhancing Teamwork and Problem solving skills.

education.title: Secondary School Certification
education.subTitle: Maharashtra State Board
education.text: I developed problem solving and analytical skills, laying the foundation for a tech career. I gained a foundation in English, languages, and mathematics, shaping my journey.

contactData.title: Contact Info
contactData.subTitle: Visit my social profile and get connected
contactData.text: Contact us today to discuss your project needs and explore how we can bring your ideas to life with innovative solutions.
